metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1311 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: The Apache Xerces-C 3.0.0 to 3.2.3 XML parser contains a use-after-freeerror triggered during the scanning of external DTDs. This flaw has notbeen addressed in the maintained version of the library and has no currentmitigation other than to disable DTD processing. This can be accomplishedvia the DOM using a standard parser feature, or via SAX using theXERCES_DISABLE_DTD environment variable.

criterions.comment: xerces-c package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
